scripts.start: concurrently "cd mf-geotributos && ng serve" "cd mf-ibi && ng serve" "cd mf-shared && ng serve" "cd mf-shell && ng serve"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd mf-geotributos && npm install --legacy-peer-deps" "cd mf-ibi && npm install --legacy-peer-deps" "cd mf-shared && npm install --legacy-peer-deps" "cd mf-shell && npm install --legacy-peer-deps"
